attributes.action: Let the future Champions carry on training indoors.
attributes.additional_details:
The competitor athletes who do sports in leisure centres that require indoor facilities are unfortunately left in a position to suffer due to the government's latest lockdown decision.

The efforts of these young athletes who have been training 4-5 hours a day throughout their sports life starting from the age of 5-6 are wasted.

It is not fair to take away the training rights of young athletes, who are considered safe to be educated in classes of 20-30 kids and use public transport.
attributes.background: Allow all squad selected youth athletes from the age of five that cannot train outside to continue to train in their indoor facilities during this lockdown.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Since you started your petition, the November national lockdown in England has ended. You could start a petition calling for changes to the local tier restrictions currently in place, if there are specific changes you would like to see happen. 

You might also like to sign the following petition:

Allow all youth sport to continue during lockdowns
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557497
